# Youtube

## Allgmein nützliche Tricks

### Make a Link _directly_ to the relevant part of a Youtube-Video

- You simply need to copy a full youtube-video-link and add the suffix `&t=3m45s`. This is just an example, you can put in any minutes or seconds.

## Video-Bearbeitungs-Software

- Free to use: [Davinci Resolve](https://www.blackmagicdesign.com/products/davinciresolve/)

## Copy-Right

- Genererller Überblick der Regeln für Musik: [Linzenzfreie Musik für Youtube-Videos](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qw2owtU1mD4)
- <u>Trick to avoid Copy-Right when using Screenshots in a video</u>: make a screenshot from someone else's Youtube-Video that took the original screenshot himself!
